content:
{"name": "John O. Wilson Hamilton Neighborhood Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Serves: Mercer County
* Our food distribution program is available to eligible residents by appointment every other Thursday between the hours of 9 am and 4 pm., must come in with their application and verifying documents. 
* Food Pantry Service area: East Windsor, Ewing, Hamilton, Hopewell, Pennington, Robbinsville, Trenton, West Windsor, and Yardville
* Income under 200% of the Federal Poverty Guidelines per Family Size
* Verification/Determination letters as source of income are accepted and required
* Proof of income for ALL ADULTS in the house (last 4 weeks are required)
* Social Security Card for EVERYONE in the household (Including children)
* Birth Certificates for ALL children in the household
* NJ Driver’s License or Photo ID with your current address for ALL ADULTS in the household", "email": "", "url": "https://jowilsoncenter.org/events-1/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "169 Wilfred Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Hamilton Township", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08610", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.2033926, "longitude": -74.7283504}, "phones": [{"number": "(609) 393-6480", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}]}
